ace-pattern-specification.description: ACE system pattern specification format with YAML frontmatter and markdown documentation
patterns: YAML frontmatter with pattern_id, name, domain, language, type, confidence, observations
Markdown sections: Pattern Overview, Description, Statistics, Pattern ID, When to Use, Related Patterns
Auto-generated footer with ACE attribution and arXiv reference

multi-epoch-training-system.description: Multi-epoch offline training system for iterative machine learning pattern refinement

ace-pattern-metadata.description: Structured metadata system for tracking pattern evolution and statistics

ace-playbook-organization.description: Hierarchical playbook directory structure with numbered prefixes and descriptive names

incremental-learning-architecture.description: Iterative learning system that improves patterns through observation and refinement cycles

evidence-based-documentation.description: Documentation generated from actual usage data and metrics rather than static content

structured-metadata-first.description: System design where structured metadata (YAML) precedes human-readable content

confidence-driven-curation.description: Pattern validation and filtering based on statistical confidence scores

hierarchical-knowledge-organization.description: Multi-level organization system using domains, playbooks, and pattern IDs

machine-generated-with-human-readability.description: Auto-generated content structured for both machine processing and human comprehension

observability-through-metrics.description: Track system behavior through measurable statistics rather than assumptions

temporal-awareness.description: Maintain temporal context through timestamps for evolution tracking

self-improving-systems.description: Systems that evolve and refine their own knowledge through usage feedback

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths, YAML frontmatter, markdown structure, and training metadata
